text: (Nuh) noi: “Chac chan su trung phat va con thinh no cua Thuong Đe cua cac nguoi se giang xuong cac nguoi. Le nao cac nguoi lai tranh luan voi ta ve nhung cai ten (than linh) do chinh cac nguoi va to tien cua cac nguoi bia ra chu Allah khong he ban cho bat cu tham quyen nao? Vay thi cac nguoi hay cho xem, Ta cung se cho xem cung voi cac nguoi.”
